A

Action - Class in de.stock.action
Base class of actions

The action system knows two types of actions which start and stop without the players influence (they run a number of rounds)

- MainEvent can start on his own or by another event.

- SubEvent can be started by another event only.

and one extraordinary

- LevelPack gets chosen by player at startup and has goals to complete to get to next level.
  These level packs are seperated into different level stages and if one is finished the next (more difficult) level stage gets played
  (See LevelPack for further information)

Action developers must instantiate MainEvent, SubEvent or LevelPack
They must not instantiate Action
Action() - Constructor for class de.stock.action.Action
 
ActionObserver - Class in de.stock.action
The action observer holds all main events, currently active events and currently active levels.

It does not hold the sub events as these can be called by other events only

The action observer iterates every round over:

- all (not running) main events to check if they are ready to be executed and executes them if time has come.

- all running events and checks if their days are over.
  If their days are over it gets a successor event if available, starts this event and removes the old one from the list of running events.

- all running levels and checks if their goal is reached
  If their goal is reached it gives the user the prize/shows the award and gets the next level (from same stage or next stage) if available
ActionObserver() - Constructor for class de.stock.action.ActionObserver
 
activeEvents - Variable in class de.stock.action.ActionObserver
All active events with their remaining rounds
activeLevels - Variable in class de.stock.action.ActionObserver
 
activeTradables - Variable in class de.stock.tradeable.TradableHandler
Tradables with their current value
addFirstLevel(ILevel) - Method in interface de.stock.level.ILevelPack
 
addFirstLevel(ILevel) - Method in class de.stock.level.LevelPack
 
addSuccessor(IAction) - Method in class de.stock.action.Action
Adds successor to action if it wasn't present already
addSuccessor(IAction) - Method in interface de.stock.action.IAction
Adds successor to action if it wasn't present already
addTradable(ITradable) - Method in class de.stock.tradeable.TradableHandler
Adds tradeable to available tradeables

Use TradableHandler.register(ITradable) to set tradeable active!
Area - Class in de.stock.environment.types
An area is a type of environment and lies in the middle of the environment hierarchy

Requirements:
- Its a geographical boundary
- It must not have a unique proper name

Typical areas are a forest or a desert
Area() - Constructor for class de.stock.environment.types.Area
 
AVAILABLE_COUNTRIES - Static variable in class de.stock.settings.Settings_Game
All available countries player can choose from
AVAILABLE_CURRENCIES - Static variable in class de.stock.settings.Settings_Game
All available currencies player can choose from
AWARD_LEVEL - Static variable in class de.stock.settings.Settings_Level
Award level specific level stage
